title: Effects of Galantamine and Donépézil on the Amount and the Quality oh the Sleep in Patients Suffering From Alzheimer Disease.
description_brief: The aim of the study is the analysis of two inhibitors of Ach-E: galantamine and donépézil in over 65 years' old patients suffering from Alzheimer disease (MMSE between 20 and 26) without Alzheimer's medication.
description_detailed: Feasibility study, open, randomized, controlled, cross-over study in 65 years old patients.
